text: Defluviimonas nitratireducens is a Gram-negative, short-rod-shaped and non- motile bacterium from the genus of Defluviimonas which has been isolated from seawater from the Dalian Bay. ==References== ==External links== *Type strain of Defluviimonas nitratireducens at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Rhodobacteraceae Category:Bacteria described in 2017
title: Defluviimonas nitratireducens
